page.title: 12HOLY CROSS JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a{Junior School (}7 to 11 year olds). There are approximately {300 pupils}in the school. The school was built in{1968,}although this year, 1985 , the building has had to be{re-clad and re-furbished}-with a new boiler; painted inside and out; carpeting and false ceilings installed in every classroom. The total cost was{Â£400,000. At the present time there are{10 {classes.}Each class has its own room, where the pupils remain for a year, being taught all the curriculum subjects by the class teacher. But at the end of each year the pupils move on to a different teacher. We{start school}at{9 a.m.}and{finish at{3.15 p.m. Lunch}is an hour - from {12-1 p.m.}We also have two{breaks}of 15 minutes each -one in the morning and one in the afternoon.
